description: My professional journey building web solutions for various companies and clients.
achievements_1: Developed full web applications using React, Node.js, and Express following MVC architecture and clean code practices.
Built SPAs with CRUD operations, authentication, role-based access control, route protection, and session persistence.
Implemented modern and responsive interfaces using React, Tailwind, and scalable UI patterns.
Worked in Agile/Scrum environments, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams and delivering features in iterative sprints.
achievements_2: Built and deployed real-world applications such as PetMatch and GreenPath Market, integrating Mercado Pago and efficient REST APIs.
Developed TaskLancer (SaaS) using Next.js and Prisma, implementing authentication with NextAuth and role-based access control.
Implemented scalable full-stack architectures with React, TypeScript, Express, and PostgreSQL, prioritizing security (JWT) and performance.
Managed end-to-end project workflows, gathering requirements and delivering tailored software solutions.
achievements_3: Built over 10 practical projects to strengthen frontend and backend skills.
Developed REST APIs with Node.js and Express and practiced both SQL and NoSQL databases.
Used Git and GitHub for version control and collaborative workflows.
Experimented with UI/UX design using Figma, Tailwind, and reusable components.
